name: statetree
description: Library for creation data-oriented architecture of web applications.

scripts.test: bash -c 'MOCHA_COLORS=true ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -b --sort --full-trace tests/*/*.js | node tests_add_stack.js; test "${PIPESTATUS[0]}" -eq "0" && node tests_check.js'

author: Oleg Sergienko
